works.description:
(A)

I am the joint owner of the Nova Book Company. Since 2008 I have been 
selling an ebook file in PDF format.The title is "Reading Music Scales With 
Ease". The sales page is on my website at: 
http://www.musicwithease.com/play-music-scales.html 

This ebook was published by my firm, the Nova Book Company, and was written 
by my colleagues, Betty Dawn Wagner and Anne Elizabeth Dollin. (See: 
http://www.aussiebee.com.au/dollin-websites.html ) 

This ebook file includes the following copyrighted works: 
-- Playing Music Scales With Ease (pages 1 - 39) 
-- Reading Ledger Line Notes With Ease (pages 40 - 61) 
-- Who Invented Our System of Writing Down Music (pages 62-63) 
-- Who Chose the Notes That Our Instruments Play? (pages 64 - 66) 
-- A Glossary of Musical Symbols, Terms and Ornaments (pages 67-74) 

We have recently discovered that the website, pr44.com.au (registered by 
Dianne Etcell), is distributing without our permission the above-mentioned 
copyrighted material in the form of five (5) downloadable PDFs, as follows: 
-- Easy Scales 
-- Glossary of Musical Symbols, Terms and Ornaments 
-- Ledger Line Notes 
-- History - Invention of Writing Down Music 
-- History - Who Chose the Notes for Instruments 

In each case all of our copyright ownership information has been either 
deleted or covered over by white boxes. 

In every case when you download the PDF file and then search for the string 
"www.musicwithease.com , our website address is revealed at the bottom of 
each page. 

Furthermore, our records show that a Cherie Etcell purchased a copy of our 
ebook file "Reading Music Scales With Ease" from the Music With Ease 
website on 14 July 2008 (Clickbank Order No: JXE6GQ4Q). Documentation of 
this purchase will be supplied to you upon request.

FURTHERMORE, the Etcell infringing copy entitled Ledger Line Notes (described above) also appears (inside an iframe) at the EBOOKBOOKBROWSE.COM website on these pages:
http://ebookbrowse.com/ledger-line-notes-pdf-d308626984
http://ebookbrowse.com/gdoc.php?id=308626984&url=beedbfcac89424e3898c8be915e96853
